SELECT dctp.id AS id, dctp.NAME AS name, dctp.source_type AS source_type, dctp.built_in AS built_in, dctp.ENABLE AS enable, dctp.creation_date AS creation_date, dctp.created_by AS created_by, dctc.id AS category_id, dctc.category AS category_name FROM devops_ci_template_pipeline dctp JOIN devops_ci_template_category dctc ON dctp.ci_template_category_id=dctc.id WHERE 1=1
and (dctp.source_id = 0 OR dctp.source_id = #{sourceId})
and (dctp.source_id = 0 OR dctp.source_id = #{sourceId})
AND (dctp.source_id = 0 OR dctp.source_id= #{organizationId} OR dctp.source_id=#{sourceId} )
AND dctp.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND dctc.category LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{categoryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND dctc.id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND dctp.built_in = 1 OR (dctp.built_in = 0 AND dctp.source_type = 'site')
AND dctp.built_in = 1
AND dctp.built_in = 0 AND dctp.source_type != 'site'
AND dctp.built_in = 0
AND dctp.enable = 1
AND dctp.enable = 0
AND dctp.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{params, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
ORDER BY field( dctp.source_type, 'project', 'organization', 'site' ) ASC, dctp.id desc, field( dctp.built_in, '0', '1' ) ASC
